long_description: Wear the waterproof 686 Plexus McCarthy shell jacket over a warm fleece layer on cold winter days or over a base layer when it's a bit warmer for protection from wind and snow while snowboarding. INFIDRY-20(TM) breathable waterproof coating provides the highest level of weather protection offered by 686 for use in blizzardlike conditions. Polyester exterior has fully taped seams to keep moisture from getting in. Zippered hand pockets and a flip-up season pass holder keep all your essentials close at hand. Open up the pit zippers to vent body heat quickly. Internal, adjustable powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth. Expedition fit has an ergonomic tailored cut that moves with you and doesn't get in the way. 686 Plexus McCarthy shell jacket is rated to keep you warm from about 20degF to 40degF.
short_description: Wear the waterproof 686 Plexus McCarthy shell jacket over a warm fleece layer on cold winter days or over a base layer when it's a bit warmer for protection from wind and snow while snowboarding.
